metadata.title: CVE-2022-22759 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: If a document created a sandboxed iframe withoutallow-scripts, and subsequently appended an element to theiframe's document that e.g. had a JavaScript event handler - the eventhandler would have run despite the iframe's sandbox. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 97, Thunderbird < 91.6, and Firefox ESR < 91.6.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
